name: Cocos DevTools
description: Extends chrome Developer Tools, adding a tab that displays the Cocos2d engine data
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' chrome-extension-resource: ; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' 'none' chrome-extension-resource: ; font-src *; connect-src *; frame-src *; img-src data: http: https:;
